nodes.bodyText: I guess you misunderstood this error msg, this tells the user that his/her smartphone doesn't have a speech recognition engine, furthermore, it can't be downloaded.(has nothing to do with the chosen language)

please change this variable to something longer like textToSpeech

This makes no sense to me, tts is globally known as shortcut for text to speech!
